snippet: In his second year as the manager of the Los Angeles Dodgers, Don Mattingly has the team at the top of the National League.
abstract: Profile of Los Angeles Dodgers manager Don Mattingly, who, in his second year, has the team at the top of the National League; Mattingly spent his entire playing career with New York Yankees, but says he is happy with the Dodgers and never wonders how his life would have unfolded if the Yankees hired him instead of Joe Girardi in 2007.
lead_paragraph: In his second year as the manager of the Los Angeles Dodgers, Don Mattingly has the team at the top of the National League.

headline.seo: Don Mattingly, Raised a Yankee and Happy to Be a Dodger
headline.main: Raised a Yankee, Mattingly Is Happy to Be a Dodger
headline.print_headline: Raised a Yankee, Mattingly Is Happy to Be a Dodger
